itemInfo.itemDesc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Rare Jerky
item.desc: A dried meat snack useful for long journeys.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying Butchered Meat.\n- It increases HP slightly when used.

item.name: Tin Candelabra with Four Candles
item.desc: A tin candelabra with 4 candles attached.

item.name: Brass Candelabra with Four Candles
item.desc: A brass candelabra with 4 candles attached.
